sentence.short: Deschanel Nfor has excelled in various fields of Computer Engineering.
sentence.medium: Deschanel Nfor has been awarded for outstanding performance in Full Stack Web Development and Android Development.

columns.sentence-medium: Obtained certifications in Java, Python, and C++ programming languages

columns.sentence-short: Recognized as a skilled web developer
columns.sentence-medium: Received awards for outstanding work in Laravel and React JS development
Honored for excellence in both native and CrossPlatform Android app development
Received accolades for being a proficient Full Stack Web Developer and Android Developer

list.list-item-long: Best Full Stack Web Developer of the Year 2021 by DesTeke Association
Certified Android Developer by Google Developers Certification Program
Received the Computer Engineering Excellence Award from the University of Buea
Acknowledged for Outstanding Contributions to the Laravel Community
Honored with the React JS Innovator Award for Exceptional Development Skills
Achieved CrossPlatform Development Expert status in Android Development
